content: bayshore crochet tee by carolyn calderon this top features broomstick lace and the unusual and repetitive stitching is fun to make as you use a knitting needle and a crochet hook in basic single_crochet and double_crochet stitches includes written instructions and video in us terminology please see pattern website for details thank you for your interest in my designs have a great day carolyn text and images c the purple poncho all rights reserved
